post.description: This API marks a comment on a forum topic as spam.
This API marks multiple comments on a forum topic as spam.
This API restores comments that were trashed from forum topics.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments that are pending moderation, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Moderation status of the comments. Values allowed are: @AWAITINGAPPROVAL@, @SPAM@, and @TRASHED@.

schema.description: Moderation status of the comments. Values allowed are: @AWAITINGAPPROVAL@, @SPAM@, and @TRASHED@.

delete.description: This API permanently deletes comments from the trash of your help desk portal.

get.description: This API fetches the total count of the comments based on the selected view.

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: ID of a view for which you need to get the count

schema.description: ID of a view for which you need to get the count

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of topics to list. Values allowed are: @ANNOUNCEMENT@, @DISCUSSION@, @IDEA@, @PROBLEM@, and @QUESTION@.

schema.description: Type of topics to list. Values allowed are: @ANNOUNCEMENT@, @DISCUSSION@, @IDEA@, @PROBLEM@, and @QUESTION@.

get.description: This API fetches a comment received on a topic.

patch.description: This API helps update a published comment.

post.description: This API deletes a comment from a topic.
This API approves comments that are pending moderation.
This API helps add a reply to a comment on a forum topic.
This API deletes a reply to a topic comment.

get.summary: List community topic comments by user
get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments by a user, based on the limit defined.

patch.description: This API helps update a published reply.

post.description: This API trashes comments that are yet to be approved for publishing on a forum topic.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments on a topic, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: latestCommentsFirst
parameters.description: Key that defines the listing order of the comments. Setting @TRUE@ lists the latest comments first (descending order) and setting @FALSE@ lists the oldest comments first (ascending order).

schema.description: Key that defines the listing order of the comments. Setting @TRUE@ lists the latest comments first (descending order) and setting @FALSE@ lists the oldest comments first (ascending order).

post.description: This API helps add a comment to a forum topic.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: ID of the community category from which the comments must be fetched
Moderation status of the comments. Values allowed are: @AWAITINGAPPROVAL@, @SPAM@, and @TRASHED@.
ID of the community category from which the comments must be fetched

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the comments must be listed

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the comments must be listed

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

endTime.name: endTime
endTime.description: Ending time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Ending time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: ID of the community category from which the comments must be fetched

schema.description: ID of the community category from which the comments must be fetched

reason.description: Reason for marking the comment as spam

value.reason: Reason for marking a topic's comment as spam

notifyMentions.description: whether to notify mentioned user while updateing content.
whether to notify mentioned user while updateing content.
